rules.title: How to play
rules.rule1: Find all 8 hidden words in the grid
rules.rule2: Tap the first letter of a word, then tap the last letter to mark it
rules.rule3: Words go left-to-right, top-to-bottom, or diagonally
rules.rule4: Difficulty: Easy (short words), Medium (medium words), Hard (long words)
